title: Utilization of Multinomial Naive Bayes Algorithm and Term Frequency Inverse Document Frequency (TF-IDF Vectorizer) in Checking the Credibility of News Tweet in the Philippines. (arXiv:2306.00018v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: The digitalization of news media become a good indicator of progress and signal to more threats. Media disinformation or fake news is one of these threats, and it is necessary to take any action in fighting disinformation. This paper utilizes ground truth-based annotations and TF-IDF as feature extraction for the news articles which is then used as a training data set for Multinomial Naive Bayes. The model has an accuracy of 99.46% in training and 88.98% in predicting unseen data. Tagging fake news as real news is a concerning point on the prediction that is indicated in the F1 score of 89.68%. This could lead to a negative impact. To prevent this to happen it is suggested to further improve the corpus collection, and use an ensemble machine learning to reinforce the prediction

translated_title: 利用多项式朴素贝叶斯算法和Term Frequency Inverse Document Frequency (TF-IDF向量化器)检查菲律宾新闻推文的可信度。
translated_abstract: 新闻媒体的数字化成为进步的良好指标，也是更多威胁的信号。虚假信息或假新闻是其中之一，有必要采取行动来打击虚假信息。本文利用基于真实标注的注释和TF-IDF作为特征提取新闻文章，然后用作Multinomial Naive Bayes的训练数据集。该模型在训练时的准确率为99.46％，在预测未见数据时为88.98％。将假新闻标记为真新闻是预测中的一个关注点，在F1得分中表现为89.68％。这可能会产生负面影响。为了防止这种情况发生，建议进一步改进语料库收集，并使用集成机器学习来加强预测。
tldr: 本文利用多项式朴素贝叶斯算法和TF-IDF向量化器检查菲律宾新闻推文的可信度，在训练和预测中表现良好。建议进一步改进语料库收集，并使用集成机器学习来加强预测。
en_tdlr: This paper utilizes Multinomial Naive Bayes algorithm and TF-IDF vectorizer to check the credibility of news tweets in the Philippines, with good performance in both training and predicting. Further improvement in corpus collection and ensemble machine learning is suggested to reinforce the prediction.
